alert.note: Alert for Southern High Plains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued January 10 at 2:17PM MST until January 13 at 5:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM THURSDAY TO 11 AM MST FRIDAY... ...WIND CHILL WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THURSDAY TO 5 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 4 inches. For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 50 below zero. * WHERE...Southern High Plains. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 5 AM Thursday to 11 AM MST Friday. For the Wind Chill Warning, from 5 PM Thursday to 5 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.
